name: NTXRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. t. x. radio
des: NTX Radio, formerly JoCo Community Radio, is a multi-platform broadcasting collective serving North Texas. Our mission is to amplify diverse voices and foster community connections through a dynamic range of programming, including local news, entertainment, talk segments, and cultural showcases. As "The Voice of North Texas," NTX Radio is dedicated to delivering content that is informative, entertaining, and thought-provoking, reflecting the unique spirit and heritage of the region.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
